name: WarCard (Ludum Dare 41)
description:
WarCard is a realtime strategy and deck-building card game hybrid. Build a deck with cards representing tanks, mechanics and airstrikes cards and use them wisely to win the war.

Made in a weekend with the Godot Engine for Ludum Dare 41.

Ludum Dare entry

Controls
  • Scroll the camera by pointing close to the left or right edge of the window.
  • Use a card by left-clicking it.
  • Select the airstrike target by left-clicking the world.
